profile.name: Aakrity Singh
profile.title: Senior Product Manager
profile.summary: Strategic Product Manager with 7+ years of experience transforming complex business challenges into user-centric solutions. Expertise in B2B SaaS, mobile platforms, and AI-driven products. Led cross-functional teams of 15+ engineers, designers, and analysts to deliver products that generated $15M+ in revenue growth and improved user satisfaction by 45%. Passionate about data-driven decision making and building products that solve real user problems.

caseStudies.title: E-commerce Mobile App Redesign
caseStudies.subtitle: Transforming the shopping experience for 2M+ users
caseStudies.description: Led the complete redesign of our mobile e-commerce application to improve user experience and increase conversion rates.
caseStudies.challenge: The existing mobile app had a 23% cart abandonment rate and poor user ratings (2.8/5). Users complained about confusing navigation, slow checkout process, and lack of personalization.
caseStudies.solution: Conducted extensive user research, implemented a new design system, streamlined the checkout process, and introduced AI-powered product recommendations. Collaborated with engineering, design, and data science teams over 6 months.
results: Reduced cart abandonment rate from 23% to 12%
Improved app store rating from 2.8 to 4.6 stars
Generated $2.3M additional revenue in first quarter post-launch

caseStudies.title: SaaS Dashboard Analytics Platform
caseStudies.subtitle: Building data-driven insights for enterprise customers
caseStudies.description: Developed a comprehensive analytics dashboard for our B2B SaaS platform to help enterprise customers make data-driven decisions.
caseStudies.challenge: Enterprise customers were struggling to extract meaningful insights from their data, leading to low feature adoption and high churn risk. Existing reporting was limited and not customizable.
caseStudies.solution: Built a flexible analytics platform with customizable dashboards, real-time data visualization, and automated reporting. Implemented user segmentation and cohort analysis features.
results: Reduced time-to-insight from days to minutes
Generated $1.8M in upsell revenue through premium analytics features

caseStudies.title: AI-Powered Content Recommendation Engine
caseStudies.subtitle: Personalizing user experience with machine learning
caseStudies.description: Implemented an AI-driven content recommendation system to increase user engagement and time spent on platform.
caseStudies.challenge: Users were experiencing content fatigue with generic recommendations, leading to decreased engagement and session duration. Manual content curation was not scalable.
caseStudies.solution: Partnered with data science team to develop machine learning algorithms for personalized content recommendations. Implemented A/B testing framework to optimize recommendation accuracy.
